            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>The monthly repayment amount, Annualised Percentage Rate (APR) and total interest amount shown in the calculator are for indication only and not meant to be final.</li>
 <li>A redraw charge of 1% on the redrawn loan amount and rounded up to one decimal place (or HKD50, whichever is higher) will be calculated and deducted from the loan amount when draw down (if applicable).</li>
 <li>The rates for individual customers may vary. Please call our hotline, or log on to HSBC Online Banking or HSBC HK Mobile Banking app to enquire about your eligible rates including APR and repayment information.</li>
 <li>The illustration does not reflect the actual allocation of principal and interest. Please also note that the actual monthly repayment amount may differ, customers should refer to the loan confirmation letter for the actual related information.</li>
 <li>The monthly repayment amount and the APR is calculated based on a 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42, 48, 54 or 60-month repayment period and loan amount of every HKD10,000 (which comprises an outstanding principal of HKD5,000 and a redrawn loan amount of HKD5,000) and a redraw charge of 1% on the redrawn loan amount. The monthly repayment amount is rounded up to one decimal place.</li>
 <li>The APR is calculated using the method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places. An APR is a reference rate, which includes all applicable interest rates, fees and charges of the product, expressed as an annualised rate.</li>
 <li>View <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/loans/personal-instalment-loan-redraw/key-facts-statement.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Key Fact Statements</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Key Fact Statements  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</li>
 <li>Terms and conditions apply.</li>
</ul>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-MASTERTILEITEM-DEV"><div id="pp_main_tile_1" class="A-PNL-RW-ALL">
    
    <a href="/loans/help-starting-a-business/" data-event-component="text link" data-event-name="article_starting your own business" class="A-LNKC28L-RW-ALL" target="_self">
        
    
    <div class="heading">
          
       
<h3 class="link">

How to plan and get a loan for a new business</h3> <span class="icon icon-chevron-right-small" aria-hidden="true"></span>

    </div>

        
        
        
    </a>

            <h3 id="1985920297__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How much should I borrow? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1985920297__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_14">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_24" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_6" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There are two main things to consider: how much you need to borrow, and how much you can afford to repay.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It is best to borrow only what you actually need and to resist the temptation to add extra borrowing. Remember that your loan does not have to be for a round figure, so you can usually borrow exactly the amount of any large purchase.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When working out your repayments, look at all your other spending. It is unwise to spend more than 30% of your gross monthly income on all your loan repayments put together - with the possible exception of mortgage repayments, which may be up to 50% of your income.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Make sure that you can afford the extra cost of loan repayments without leaving you unable to meet other financial commitments.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_4" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1548780341__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1548780341__tab0" class="dropdown-text">How long should I borrow for? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1548780341__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_15">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_25" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_7" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A good general rule is not to borrow for longer than the life of the thing you are paying for. For example, if you have an annual expense such as a tax bill then a loan of 12 months or less would be the best choice - otherwise you will still be paying off your first loan when the next year's tax demand arrives.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">With careful budgeting, you can balance the amount you borrow with the period of the loan and the amount you can afford to repay each month.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    <div id="pp_main_advanced_expander_5" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1248801385__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1248801385__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="pp_main_columnControl_16">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="pp_main_columnControlColumn_26" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_main_richtext_8" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can retry later or you can redraw from your Personal Instalment Loan account in several ways:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By phone on <a href="tel:+85227488080" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2748 8080</a></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">At any HSBC branch in Hong Kong</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">By completing the <a href="https://dco-form-pilrw.hsbc.com.hk/?lng=en_HK" target="_blank" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C101315_3" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">online application form</span><span class="visuallyhidden">online application form  This link will open in a new window</span></a></p>
</div></div>

   <td><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In order to facilitate the evaluation and approval of your loan application, we may need to further clarify some details with you and we would send you SMS / email notification to ask for your call back to our loan application designated hotline <a href="tel:+85222882191" class="no-link" role="presentation">22882191</a>. For interest rate (p.a.) following the first 3 months, APR and your applicable interest rate, please call our hotline 27488080 or log on to HSBC HK App. The APR is calculated using method specified in relevant guidelines issued by The Hong Kong Association of Banks, and is rounded up or down to the nearest two decimal places.
